articles.description: Kenya has ordered 24 million doses of the COVID-19 vaccine developed by AstraZeneca and expects them to start arriving in the second week of February, its health minister said.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
FILE PHOTO: Vials with a sticker reading, "COVID-19 / Coronavirus vaccine / Injection only" and a medical syringe are seen in front of a displayed AstraZeneca logo in this illustrat… [+1280 chars]

articles.author: Anonymous
articles.title: Opioid use might increase risk of developing pancreatic cancer - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The study, titled “Opioid Use as a Potential Risk Factor for Pancreatic Cancer in the United States,” is the first in the country to show evidence that opioid use may be an unidentified risk factor contributing to the increasing incidence of pancreatic cancer.
articles.content:
Researchers at Rush University Medical Center have found that opioid use might increase a persons risk of developing pancreatic cancer.
The study, titled Opioid Use as a Potential Risk Factor for Pa… [+3953 chars]

articles.title: Latest Covid-19 infection rates in the North East as cases rocket by 86% across region - Chronicle Live

articles.content:
